context: Hey there, how are you doing?!
I’m doing great and yourself ?? I’m looking for a great comedy and or action movie any suggestions
Yes Dumb and Dumber (1994) was pretty funny The most recent comedy movie I saw was Jumanji (2017) and Deadpool 2 (2018)
what did you think of Deadpool 2 (2018) ?
It was hilarious I want to go see it again lol Have you seen Black Panther (2018) ?!
resp: Yes, I have seen it, It's a great movie. ( Black Panther (2018) )
